text: Hello, I don't know from which channel I should ask my question. That's why I'm writing here. I have contacts coming from different pipelines and each of them is connected to a resource. We want to open tickets and manage tickets according to these resources. If there is an automation we can use here, can you direct us?

Hello community!
I wanted to use portal Id and user Id to map data in my server but I'm not able to access the current user info inside the Calling Extension.
Is there a way to access user's portal Id and user Id inside Calling Extension SDK?
No one using OAuth alongside HubSpot?
